nodes.bodyText: This doesn't look right.  As we discussed in the issue, we should bond to the peer rather than just adding them to our peer table and immediately advertising the node to the network.
A simpler way of implementing this would be to call the publicly exposed method PeerDiscoveryAgent.bond() from P2PNetwork.addMaintainConnection.
Do we need this logic?  Honestly not sure if we do or not, but it's a little unexpected at first glance.
